function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of contagious diseases spreading within the local indigenous communities due to increased contact with external populations.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread could lead to high mortality rates and loss of indigenous cultural knowledge.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health screening measures, provide healthcare support, and limit external contact.","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, telemedicine, and remote healthcare support.","People":"Local indigenous communities, project staff, external visitors.","Owner":"Local indigenous communities, project staff, healthcare professionals."}]}
